tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FailedErrorLogs (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    error_message TEXT,
    error_code INT,
    attempted_correction TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE CorrectionLogs (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    error_code INT,
    correction_method TEXT,
    successful BOOLEAN,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE CorrectionStatistics (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    correction_method TEXT,
    success_rate DECIMAL,
    total_attempts INT,
    total_successes INT
);
